name: Gonggi Nori With Me
description:
Gonggi Nori With Me is a game adapted from traditional children play. One of the titles is Gonggi Nori in Korea. A game throwing and catching small items with one’s hand.

How to play:

In the game scene, click on one of the objects on the floor. Click again to begin the toss and catch.

In QuickTime event. Click when the arrow is in the highlighted bar to avoid missing and losing turn.

After completing a level, repeat steps above until the scoring phase.

Click when all arrows are inside the highlighted bar to get most pending scores (1 arrow inside bar = 2 scores).

The total round of the game is 3 rounds.
